dataList.content: The child’s eyes were laden with drowsiness and fatigue.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …Sensor signals’re all clear. We should secure the aisle.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Yaaawn… Ah, gee~ What a hassle.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I mean, yeah, ‘course I’m doing it~ Haaa, why do we gotta do it to help the bus crew, though?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: It’s what the LCC is tasked with.
“I know!” The child playfully retorted, smacking her lips.
The LCC’s work is to assist the 12 Sinners aboard Mephistopheles and ensure that they successfully retrieve the Golden Boughs. It was a fact she was well aware of.
Truthfully, the work didn’t really strain her.
She didn’t have any amateurish complaints about risking her life to help people she’s never met personally, either.
If anything… she just disliked that her job didn’t bring much excitement.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Man~ I bet I could do the bus thing just as well. Plus, that guy… Vergilius? I wanna see him, too.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …You know you can’t jump over just like that. Those Sinners are—

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I know, have to resonate with that clockhead or whatever. Tsk, I know what it takes. I was just saying…
The child sighed, then spoke into the radio.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: This is Rodya, commencing advance reconnaissance on containment in Sector E-361~
She did a warm-up exercise, and then told her crew:
